author: tucu
msg: OOZIE-1016 Tests that use junit assert or fail in a new thread report success when they are actually failing (rkanter via tucu)

author: aharui
msg: Hopefully fix these skin states tests for good.  In theory, you should not have a wait event prior to the WaitForEvent for the "complete" event because you don't know how long it will take for the SWFs to load and they oculd load before the WaitForEvent gets set up.  Also add timeouts for when the load takes longer than expected.
